 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֶלְתָּחָה‎</span> **noun feminine** apparently ==wardrobe, wearing apparel== (Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***tunic***); — only in <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיּאֹמֶר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הוֺצֵא לְבוּשׁ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַאֲשֶׁר עַלהַֿמ‎</span> [[2Kgs.10.22|2Kgs 10:22]] [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">ἐπὶ τοῦ [οἴκου] μεσθααλ</span> (<span class="bdbLangGreek">μισθ’</span>); [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]] ***super vestes***.
